mathematica: Tan[ x ]*Sinh[ Sin[ x ] ] (* Even Part *)nn = 20; Table[(CoefficientList[Series[Sinh[Sin[x]]*Tan[x], {x, 0, 2*nn}], x] * Range[0, 2*nn]!)[[n]], {n, 1, 2*nn+1, 2}] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 23 2015 *)
